name: PENNSYLVANIA STATE LODGE OF the FRATERNAL ORDER OF POLICE, by Francis P. BASCELLI, Trustee Ad Litem, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania
name_abbreviation: Pennsylvania State Lodge of Fraternal Order of Police v. Commonwealth

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
parties: PENNSYLVANIA STATE LODGE OF the FRATERNAL ORDER OF POLICE, by Francis P. BASCELLI, Trustee Ad Litem, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
LARSEN and McDERMOTT, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: James L. McAneny, Gary M. Lightman, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Anne K. Fiorenza, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
591 A.2d 1054
PENNSYLVANIA STATE LODGE OF the FRATERNAL ORDER OF POLICE, by Francis P. BASCELLI, Trustee Ad Litem, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 9, 1991.
Decided May 29, 1991.
James L. McAneny, Gary M. Lightman, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Anne K. Fiorenza, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
